评论详情: These pants have truly impressed me with their versatility, comfort, and style. These athletic leggings are perfect for a variety of activities, from working out to lounging at home. The fabric is incredibly soft and stretchy, providing a snug fit that moves with you during any activity.  One of the standout features is the practical design. The joggers come with well-placed pockets that are deep enough to securely hold my phone, keys, and other essentials while I’m on the go. This feature is a game-changer, especially when I’m out running or in the middle of a workout session, and I need easy access to my belongings. The waistband is wide and elastic, ensuring a comfortable fit that stays in place without digging into my skin.  The tapered leg design adds a modern and stylish touch to these joggers, making them suitable for both active and casual wear. I love that I can transition seamlessly from a yoga class to running errands without feeling underdressed. The material is also moisture-wicking, which keeps me dry and comfortable even during intense workouts. It’s evident that these pants were designed with the active woman in mind.  Another aspect that sets these joggers apart is their durability. I’ve washed them multiple times, and they still look and feel as good as new. The color doesn’t fade, and the fabric maintains its elasticity and softness. This level of quality is rare, especially at such an affordable price point.  I also appreciate the variety of colors and sizes available. There’s something for everyone, and finding the perfect fit is easy. The quality and affordability of these joggers make them a great addition to any wardrobe, whether you're an athlete or just someone who appreciates comfort and style in their everyday wear.  These pants have quickly become my go-to choice for workouts, yoga sessions, and casual outings. They offer the perfect blend of functionality and fashion, making them a must-have for any active woman. Highly recommended!

I’ve been looking for a pair of flattering joggers since I’m kind of tired of the leggings look. I was originally looking for some with jersey material when I came across these. I would describe them as a cross between joggers and leggings and they are fantastic! The material is similar to leggings - stretchy and silky. Like the kind of material dog/cat hair doesn’t stick to (this is super important to me because we have four dogs and three cats). They have slight compression through the lower belly which is great since I’ve had 2 kids. They are PERFECT for going to kids sport events or the gym. They feel super durable, not see through at all despite the leggings-like fabric, and perfect weight material for any season (at least in Texas). For fit reference, I’m about 10 pounds heavier than I usually am right now and I’m fairly bottom-heavy. Right now, I wear medium in leggings, 10-12 in jeans, and medium T-shirts. Since these are joggers, I wanted a looser fit so I got a Large… as you can see by the pics they are NOT loose. I would definitely say they are more snug than expected but I actually love them. I rarely go by the size charts since my measurements always put me in between sizes, but in this case, I think the size chart would probably have been pretty accurate and with my current weight & measurements, and XL would have given me the fit I thought I was looking for. But once I lose this extra 10-15 pounds from the holidays they’ll be perfect. I’m 5’5”, 180 pounds. Measurements are bust: 40” (36 DD), waist 33”, hips 45”.

Very comfortable. Slick nylon feel yoga pant material (as opposed to Terry, jersey or cotton). Its 80% polyamide, 20% spandex. Has some stretch. Soft comfort feel.  Love pockets, and wide band at waist.  I'm 5'1" and they are slightly long, but tapered ankle holds that extra 1/2-1" length. Loose fit around thigh & shin. I think they'll be nice for workout yoga, lounging, or possibly "loungy" airplane trips.

评论概述: I didn’t believe the hype… now I get it
评论详情: I have heard and seen these talked about in a few places.  Normally I don’t believe the hype around fast fashion. I am on the hunt for some good athletic wear that can be dual purpose. These surprised me! They are comfy, stylish, and great material! There is a funky odor to them out of the package. I am sure it will wash out. They are true to size. Material is plushy and stretchy. They will be great for winter and early spring.
These are absolutely the best! I bought one pair and as soon as I put them one bought a second pair. The fit was perfect, they look and feel great.

评论概述: Great for price point, didn’t fit my body type
评论详情: My body type: 5’4, slim legs/arms, straight waist/hips, round butt/chest. 128 lbs. Gain weight in waist first. Ordered size S. I look like a rectangle from the front and a curvy S from the side.  Pros: great for price point, light weight material, wide waist band (comfy) and has pockets  Cons: a bit short for me (I have longer legs for my height), too big in lower stomach/hips and under butt. I bought a S and should have ordered a XS.  These would probably be good for a lean, straight build (the fabric would hang nicely) or curvy build (could nicely fill out the cut). My bigger butt (but no hips) to smaller legs body shape made the fabric buckle in a weird way on my build.

So glad I bought these! They’re so comfortable! They fit perfectly and I’m sort of awkwardly between sizes a bit and I’m very happy with the fit. They are thick enough to not see through but not too thick whereas it’s uncomfortable for any ND folks who have any sensory issues. Pockets are great; I can fit my phone and whatnot without worrying I may lose it. These can be worn to the gym or even business casual! I work in a healthcare setting and I can look nice and prepared for whatever the day throws my way, Love love love!

I was busy and gave in to an Alexa recommendation without reviewing. The AI did a good job of recommending some thin I would like at a reasonable price. I received them in a day. The fit is perfect, they feel good and are well made. They have no Care tag, so I had to go online to find it. Hand Wash Only. Really? For athletic clothes? I definitely won’t be doing that! I’ll post later how a machine wash comes out.

Greatest Of All Time!!! Add to your cart! These are my favorite joggers I have ever owned. Tight enough to stay up but not too tight to irritate. The fabric is nice and soft and for those of us that sweat easily it’s not fleece lined or anything which I prefer. Plus the pockets are nice and deep for hands or your phone. The panty line is also very minimal. I’m ordering more!

If you’re someone in between sizes I would definitely size down. I should have known better based on reviews and i’ll be exchanging them for a smaller size. I’m 5’7 and weigh 115 and got a small but extra small would be a lot better. You can dress these up or down and they’re very comfortable with a great material!

Leggings are my daily wardrobe because they are just so relaxed and comfortable. I decided to give these joggers a try to have a different look and something a little looser. The color is as expected (navy) The size is a perfect fit. I bought the medium - I am 5"4 and 134 lbs. They are so comfortable and soft. I will definitely keep these on the favorites list to purchase more colors.
I love these! They are made with quality materials. They have pockets and are very flattering on. I also liked the ribbed ankles on pant leg. I’m 5’1” tall and 125 lbs. I wear a medium. True to size.

These were exactly what I was expecting. Great length, soft stretchy material. The waist sits above the hips but below the belly button. The color is beautiful. Only reason I’m giving 4 stars instead of 5 is they were just slightly snug in the thigh and booty area but I am pretty in between sizes. Maybe they would’ve worked perfect if I ordered a large.

Love these joggers!! I’ve bought almost every color. They fit nicely, aren’t too tight in the waist or hips. I’m curvy right now and they allow for those curves. They’re slightly longer than my legs but I bought the large petite. They do tend to stretch out a little in the waist and slide down, especially if I have my phone and credit card case in my pockets but it’s not bothersome.

评论概述: So flipping soft but I should’ve sized down
评论详情: I went with the suggested size by Amazon and they are baggy in all the wrong places. Since I’m using them for their intended purpose (walking around the neighborhood) idc too much but if you want these for both exercise then public use, I’d suggest sizing down. I’m 5’ 8”/5’ 9” and 185ish with pear/hourglass shape. These somehow made my butt disappear 🤣 again, super flipping soft though!! I don’t not recommend.

I love love these pants!  They are so soft & comfortable & cool in hot weather.  They are stylish & can be dressed up or down as needed & can be worn with so many different tops & jackets or toppers!  I purchased the hemmed style not the elastic jogger style since I like that better:). I plan to purchase more in other colors (I purchased black.)

评论概述: Be aware the gray is a purple tone
评论详情: I would have read these five stars however the gray like seems to be the case nowadays is a purple grey- not grey grey. It’s a bummer. I keep looking for something that will match my gray sweatshirts but nothing seems to be out there. I am 140 pounds 5’7” I ordered a medium. They were a tad baggy.

评论概述: Great product but didn’t fit right
评论详情: The quality of the product is great. It didn’t fit well though.

Umm.. these are Heavenly. I am a black leggings addict and that’s the only thing I’ve felt comfortable in postpartum since having two babies in 2 1/2 years. But these look and feel amazing!! They are honestly more comfortable than leggings. I will be ordering more. I’m 5’9, 220 lbs for reference with large hips and wear size 16 long jeans. I’m pleased with the length on these which is hard to come by. I would also think they’d be comfy if you’re pregnant. The waist is like leggings only not as tight, at least for me. Im a high waisted girl, these are not high waisted but sit above the hips just right and don’t cut into me. I love em! Just like the perfect casual pants, maybe a step or two up from sweats that you can wear around the house or running errands or to work out. Im a stay at home mom so they’re perfect for my lifestyle.

These joggers I think run a little big. I went down a size in them. They feel like a good pair of spandex leggings but fit like a jogger. It’s a great mix of the both. The material is a little thicker than leggings though.

I guess I need to read more closely to the description. They are real nice pants and fit well but, I wanted sweatpants. Thick ones. These are thin and not the nice fleece sweats. Keeping them because I can wear them to work.

For reference I am 5'6 and weigh approx. 170 and ordered a Med. I did not want them too loose or too tight and they are a perfect fit. They fit tighter around my ankle, slightly loose on my legs without looking baggy and fit perfect on my butt so it doesn't look flat or what I call grandma butt. Get them, get them, get them!!!! I will be ordering more!

These are super comfortable and soft. They are not see through. I highly recommend. The sizing was correct for me. I have a bigger butt and hips with a small waist and they fit well. If you have a smaller butt, I could see them being a little baggy in that area.
What I love most is how versatile these pants are. They transition from a workout to casual wear. The fit is perfect with plenty of stretch for maximum comfort
These are okay not my favorite I purchased the thick yoga pants from the same brand and absolutely loved them I had high hopes for these they are thinner and just not what I had hoped for
Amazon recommended to size up. I am a 10 in regular pants so I ordered a large. Way too big  for me ! Unfortunately had to send back & order a medium, hoping these will fit

Except for the fact that I'm lazy, and usually only hand wash my dress clothes, I love these pants.  They have an excellent fit,  pockets,  and great soft material thickness.  I also enjoy their warmth.  I have purchased a second pair because of the quality!
Love the fit and fabric.  So comfortable I will be ordering another pair.  Roomy but not baggy.  Did a yoga leg workout and was able to bend, do side kicks without any issues.
These are my second pair of these comfy, well fitting, loose but not real baggy pants. You can exercise in them and wear for almost any reason. They are 20% spandex

These are so nice! Very comfortable!  The thickness is just right, the material is soft, the fit is good and they are very comfortable!  I got size large because I am over 5’8” and I am about 148-150 lbs. perfect fit!

评论概述: The Gym People are the winners!
评论详情: I love the joggers from The Gym People. In my opinion they are more comfortable than Baleaf joggers. Both are great, but for me it would be The Gym People first, and Baleaf would be second.
I tried them on and was in love with them.  The material is fantastic and fits great.  I can see me living in them.

Normally, I wear size medium pants and fits more snug. But, the joggers is loose. I'm about 5'1 and it is little too long for me it rides above my belly. Material is stretchy, and feels thick enough. I should've gone for size small but I'll hang onto them.

评论概述: LOVE These pants! please offer more colors in size XXL.
评论详情: I adore these pants. They are very comfortable, flattering and I love the price! My only request is that you offer more colors in size XXL. I especially want some in bright Pink and the light grey blue.
This pair of joggers is so comfortable, hem hits at the perfect spot. Love the pockets. Got black.. May get in other colors!
I was a little disappointed that these were a spandex material rather than a cotton material but they are comfy and cute so I will keep them.
Loved these pants.  They are comfortable and fit great. I bought 2 pair and went back and ordered another pair.
I like the versatility of wearing joggers instead of leggings all the time. Nice material. Make sure to size down.
I just love these joggers.  Very comfy and the material is soft.  I just ordered a second pair.  They are perfect for running errands, walking the dogs, hanging out at home.
These are perfect! They are not skin tight,  just a little room to feel comfortable.  I highly recommend!

I love these. Super soft & comfy. However, I sized down based on other reviews and got a large, but I should've gotten an xl instead. They just barely fit so I'm keeping them, but they're a little tight in the stomach. The legs have plenty of room though.
I got these for the gym,  but you can wear them all day. I put them on in the morning and run all my errands. They are very comfortable when I'm working out, nice stretch to them.

评论概述: So comfortable and the color is great!
评论详情: These leggings are very comfortable-they are silky feeling and the color is so different-nice change from the basic black.

I bought these with low expectations because I've already returned two similar products. I'm 5’ 7” and weigh 125-130 lbs. I am blown away by the fit and feel of these joggers. They are pretty thin, so I was a bit concerned about wearing them today with the low temperature and rain, but I was plenty warm. I've put some other colors on my Giftster list for the holidays with family. If you've made it this far and are on the fence, DO IT. Plus, if you hate them, send’em back; win, win.
These pants are amazing! Super stretchy, lightweight, smooth, with pockets! They are everything that I need in athletic leggings!
I had bought other joggers but they started pilling. These stay nice no matter how much you wear or wash. Love them & I wear them almost every day. I have 4 colors in them.
fits well, fabric is a bit thin but not see-through at all, just will show every imperfection
I love these joggers. I’ll buy more in all the different colors. I’m 5’1” 150 lbs and the medium fit perfectly.
I’m 5’8” and 151lbs. A small fit me perfectly. The joggers are comfortable and worth the purchase.
LOVE these pants! They are so flattering on. I purchased three other colors today! Wished that the pant came in a set. I am 5’2”, 126 pounds, I ordered a medium. Perfect fit.
The pants are very comfortable and smooth. The size and fit is perfect.
This product was lightweight, esthetically pleasing, and extremely comfortable. it was easy to do daily tasks with!

The most comfy pants I have had in a while. Perfect sizing and it has POCKETS! Am absolutely going to order more colors.

评论详情: I love the black camo joggers I have so I ordered the black ones. They were way tighter than the camo ones that I have. I sent them back. Just be aware of sizing difference.

These are so comfy and also nice looking! I wear them hiking and to church. I especially like top of the waistband because it doesn't roll down! However, the pants smelled sooooo perfumey when the arrived and I had to wash them three times before wearing and they still have a mild scent. Yuck!
The pants are soft and have a suck in feel. Know that the pants are shiny and not matte. Very comfortable though!
These are the best pants. I work from home and absolutely love wearing these. I also wear them to travel in. They are the best ever.
These fit perfectly and are soo comfortable
These are the most comfortable pants - lightweight and yet sturdy!  Love the feel, color, fit!  GREAT buy!
These are so buttery soft and comfy. They’re definitely not tight and won’t suck you in but they’re fitted enough and comfy. I would definitely purchase another pair.
These are my favorite joggers and are so comfortable. Very good price and great quality.

These pants are the best! The material is soft and stretchy, but not so much that they look stretched out after all day wear. I've worn them a couple of times before washing them and they still looked great the second wear, after wearing them all day the first day (to work in an office, so they were not "dirty").  They fit perfectly - not too lose and not too tight. I did size up so they would not be right in the waist and they are just snug enough to be slimming and hold everything in :)  Those are also very versatile. I wear them in a corporate environment and also wear them casually all weekend.  I think I need more pairs. After falling in love with the first pair, I have since bought three more pairs!
Very comfortable, size was good
Fits well. Fabric great. Comfortable.
I ordered 2 more pair after I received the first 2.  These are  comfortable and look nice enough to wear out of the house.
These are so comfy and stylish. True to size. Highly recommend.
I love these leggings. I just bought my third pair. They fit perfectly. So comfortable and love the pockets.

I’m 5’1 105lbs and they fit so nicely! Finally pants that aren’t too long or too wide! Don’t mind the 2nd pic in my daughter’s room I was in the middle of cleaning and thought oh look at my pants! So comfy and nice! 😊 I like the shape it gives me and it’s not tight!
I have to buy this again and again because of the quality and very comfortable. I love it.
LOVE! They are definitely sports mom on the go

I have been looking for a comfortable leggings without feeling exposed and I found it in these leggings. My husband bought four of these in two different sizes XL and L both sizes fit differently but perfectly. The material is soft and comfortable. I love them so much I bought my daughter a few pairs. Get them, you won't regret it l!

评论概述: Perfect fit and really nice material
评论详情: These fit me so well . I ordered my usual size XXL , I am 5’5” and 210 lbs . The material is VERY NICE . They are not two thin and not thick either . Great for yoga , coffee , errands , shopping , etc … Price point was good for these leggings !! I will order more or put on my Santa list 😀

These are absolutely amazing and flattering. They give enough support and enough comfortable room. I bought a pair thrn immediately bought two more. I did not size up. Just ordered my normal size and they fit amazing.
Lightweight, comfortable & true to size. Ordering again.

I bought them in 2 colors, they are ultra comfortable for casual wear or for working out. The feel like butter!

I'm tall (5'9''), so the issue with joggers for me is that they tend to fit more like fitted calf-length leggings rather than pants that should hit at the ankle and be a bit loose. Nevertheless, I've accepted this fate and really like the color/feel/style of these pants. They are comfy and good for days or evenings when the temperature is not too hot but not really cold yet either. Nice waistline too (the stretchy waist instead of a drawstring).

These pants are so comfortable and light weight. I tried them on and immediately came back to my Amazon app and bought three more in different colors. Love the feeling of softness and how they look on me. I was confused about why it had a warning staying it was a frequently returned item.

these joggers are soft and comfortable.  Great for work or leisure.

评论概述: Love the pant; color not so much
评论详情: I am impressed with these jogger-style pants. I like the fabric and the style. The large fits perfect - I’m 5’3” and 145. Pockets are great. However, I ordered the denim blue. It isn’t any shade of blue. I’m not exactly sure what color it is. And nothing seems to go with the color - even a white t-shirt doesn’t look all that great. I’m considering returning them for navy or grey. But I definitely want a pair - maybe two!

So comfy!  I was skeptical about the material, boy was I wrong.  These joggers are so comfortable and fits perfectly.  Great value for the money. I’m always cold, but these seem to keep me from having to grab a blanket non stop. I will definitely be buying more.
I've been very happy with the fit and comfort of these pants.  I wear these often when traveling.
Lightweight, size is accurate, color is vibrant. I wouldn't say these are warm by any means. This is definitely more of a spring/ fall pant
I own 4 pairs, that’s how much I like these.
You may want to order 1 size larger to reduce tightness around the waist. They feel great and  my husband loves the way I look when wearing them.
Love the fit the quality A little pricey but will buy again They are thick Colors are nice They are smooth and soft

Although I had to order in a larger size I knew these will be comfortable. I wish only that the fabric was warmer. What I like is that these fit a petite woman if you pull the waistband all the way up , the cuffs fall at my ankles. I ordered two more in the larger size.

Thick enough to feel covered up without being too hot. Very soft, I got an XL but probably could have gone down a size if I wanted a tighter fit. The pants part is baggier but the waist is stretchy but fits perfectly. Tapers at the ankle without being too tight. Overall, incredibly comfortable, will wear these pants for lounging/running errands.
I feel like they run a little small but I’m glad I ordered up a size! They are the most comfortable joggers and buttery soft ❤️ definitely buying more!!
